## SceneUIEventPayloads."SCENE\_UI.SET\_STATE" property

Emitted when the state of a SceneUI is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[SceneUIEvent.SET_STATE]: {
        sceneUI: SceneUI;
        state: object;
    };
```
